                                                                          java.lang.String endDate)

      • mostSalesTogether

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>,​java.lang.Integer> mostSalesTogether​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String endDate)
        Gets all order ID's occurring between startDate and endDate. Looks at each individual order, and gets all of the items in that order. Generates all possible combinations of pairs for an order as n choose 2 combinations, where n is the number of items in a given order. After generating all possible combinations of items on the menu, we will map the unique pair of two items to a frequency integer. Traversing through all possible combinations of items in an order for all orders, we can increment the possible pairs calculated above for each occurrence of that pair. At the end, we can then sort that map by value, and return it.
        Parameters:
        conn -
        startDate -
        endDate -
        Returns:
        LinkedHashMap, Integer>
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                                                                                 java.lang.String startDate,
